extension.news: 3.3.109 (04-11-2020) - Add casing options for file-name based media flags - Fix media flags when pressing info in full screen video - Fix titles not showing for folders in Fanart view 3.3.108 (31-10-2020) - Use filenameandpath instead of filename for new flags - Fixes for tmdbhelper calls in video info dialog - Really Fix transparent background in music OSD - Add missing French translations (thanks cyberdom) - Misc. fixes 3.3.107 (30-10-2020) - Add flags for HDR/SDR, Atmos, DTS-X and sources (webdl, hdtv, etc.) Thanks newbii! - Add option to show file name instead of title in Icons view - Fixes transparent background in music OSD - Fix for not being able to close lyrics dialog - Misc. fixes 3.3.106 (25-10-2020) - Fix for season posters not showing in video info dialog - Make Music OSD and Video OSD popup dialogs more mouse-friendly - Fixes for Music OSD when seek bar is at the bottom - Fix highlight color for trakt dialogs - Add option to show seek bar at the bottom - Fix for actor images not showing when browsing - Add support for Movie Director Thumbnails addon - Fix for top right marks not showing for video addons - Try another fix for not being able to switch to simple list - Fix issue of not being able to switch to simple list - Fix issue of no background when trying to change viewtype - Add some missing French translations - Partial deprecation of tv show next aired - Added Simple List view - Added option for highlight color to match poster color - Misc. fixes
